description: Journeys during rush hour in Sheffield were delayed because of the crash near the city centre.
title: Sheffield: City centre traffic stopped after tram and bus collision
title_page: Sheffield: City centre traffic stopped after tram and bus collision - BBC News
maintext:
A busy road near Sheffield city centre was blocked when a bus crashed into a tram.
Photos from the scene on Granville Road on Tuesday afternoon showed a collision between a Stagecoach bus and a South Yorkshire Supertram.
Stagecoach said the road was cleared by 17:35 GMT, with delays to Supertram's blue and purple routes.
It is not yet known if anyone was injured in the crash, with the BBC asking the company for further information.
